weka.classifiers.timeseries.core
Interface IncrementallyPrimeable

All Known Implementing Classes:
WekaForecaster
public interface IncrementallyPrimeable

An interface to a forecaster that can be primed incrementally. I.e. one instance at a time.

Version:
$Revision: 49983 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

Method Summary
 void primeForecasterIncremental(Instance inst)
          Update the priming information incrementally, i.e.
 

Method Detail

primeForecasterIncremental

void primeForecasterIncremental(Instance inst)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Update the priming information incrementally, i.e. one instance at a time. To indicate the start of a new batch of priming data an empty set of instances must be passed to TSForecaster.primeForecaster() before the first call to primeForecasterIncremental()

Parameters:
inst - the instance to prime with.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong.
